title: 8 Cool Things You Can do with Solid Explorer - Best ES File Explorer Alternative
tags: 8 Cool Things You Can do with Solid Explorer

ccess your Computer Files from Android device

description: Ok, so, I finally wrote a step by step tutorial on How to Access Windows Shared Folder From Android Over Wi-Fi.     Here are 8 cool things you didn't know you can do with Solid Explorer. The best ES File Explorer alternative out there.    Download Solid Explore -   1. Dual Panel 2. Access your Android Files from other devices 3. Access your Computer Files from Android device 4. Hide Media from Gallery 5. Password protect a folder on Android  6. Extract Content of Any App 7. Edit Android Host File 8. Install any app as a system app   I use Audio from YouTube audio library.
